summary: Add file backup before overwriting to prevent data loss from bad writes
acceptance_criteria_met: Backup contains previous content before new save
Only last 3 backups kept, older ones auto-deleted
risks: Backup creation uses shutil.copy2 which preserves metadata
Backup failures are suppressed to not affect main save operation
Multiple rapid saves create unique backup filenames with microsecond precision
limitations: Backup files are stored in same directory as original file
No environment variable support for enabling/disabling (only parameter)
implementation_notes: Backup created before atomic rename, uses timestamp with microseconds for uniqueness
